Comment.Language: On Monday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: Alla Pa[oic a~rioui neman: m~v~r/] n~nirem Nineu/~: nai e~tauermetanion: ak,a nounobi nwou e~bol.
But my Lord, deal with us, like the Ninevites, who repented, You forgave them their sins.

Comment.Language: On Monday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: W v/e~tafa~reh e~Iwnac: ef,/ qen y~neji m~pik/toc: e~tauhitf e~p~swk m~v~iom: a~reh e~ron kata tekjom.
O You who preserved Jonah / in the belly of the whale / after being thrown into the depths of the sea / preserve us with Your power.
